page.title: 05TRADE IN CHIRNSIDE
page.content: There are 5 travelling shops, not including the ice-cream vans. They are 2 butchers' vans, a freezer van, a fishmonger's and a library. People often use the travelling shops when they have forgotten something at the larger towns or even in the village. The papershop and the grocers are perhaps the most popular shops. The shops provide employment for quite a few people in our area. Both Chirnside and Allanton have post offices. This is very important to people in a rural area. It means, for example, that elderly people do not have to travel to other places to collect their old age pensions. Many small villages do not boast a post office nowadays so we are very lucky. Although neither village has many shops, there are enough to supply people with their day to day requirements.
